Class ContextSourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.felix.ipojo.util.ContextSourceManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextListener

    public class ContextSourceManager
extends Object
implements ContextListener
    This class manages context-source management.

    Felix Project Team

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
